page.title: 08KNOTTINGLEY SHOPPING SURVEY.
page.content: A shopping survey asked 80 housewives where they bought meat,greengroceries, groceries,frozen food and beer and wines.Their choice included G.T.Smiths Hypermarket(G.T.S),Pontefract,local shops and Castleford. 54% of shopping was from G.T.S.,next was Pontefract with 14%, then other Knottingley shops with 13%.Beer and wines were bought locally.72 housewives had milk brought to the door,29 newspapers,15 butter and eggs,12 soft drinks and 9 green- grocery.When asked if influenced by, a) cost of transport,12 said Yes,20 Sometimes and 48 No; b) carparking, 35 said Yes, 45 No.For a larger choice of goods 43 went to Leeds,20 to Doncaster 8 to Pontefract,8 to Wakefield,3 to York,3 to Castleford,1 to Harrogate and 1 to Selby. N.B. Some chose more than one town.
